Q_DESC:
In main(), two integer variables a and b are defined. And those integers are passed to a function swap() by reference.

Compiler can identify this is
TESTCASE_1:
5 6
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
Before swapping
a = 5
b = 6

After swapping
a = 6
b = 5
TESTCASE_2:
10 20
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
Before swapping
a = 10
b = 20

After swapping
a = 20
b = 10
TESTCASE_3:
100 200
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
Before swapping
a = 100
b = 200

After swapping
a = 200
b = 100
